posts.post_content:
Have some more dupes available.

Price includes shipping. Paypal FF is preferred method, but will also accept money orders with shipment on payment received.  

I will always listen to offers but anyone saying "I'll take it" gets priority over ongoing negotiations.

$SOLD Molly Miller SGC 30 - Old Mill
$SOLD Frank King SGC 20 - Piedmont
$SOLD Dolly Stark SGC 10 - Old Mill
$SOLD Tom Guiheen SGC 10 - Piedmont
